pages.disclaimer: Diamond Resort Casino - Legal Disclaimer and Terms of Use Contact About us Casino Diamond Resort Casino - Legal Disclaimer and Terms of Use Legal Disclaimer and Terms of Use Welcome to Diamond Resort Casino. Before engaging in any gaming activities or using our services, please read this disclaimer carefully. By accessing or using our casino facilities, you agree to be bound by the terms and conditions outlined below. Age Restriction Diamond Resort Casino strictly adheres to legal age requirements for gambling. All patrons must be at least 18 years of age to enter the casino floor or participate in any gaming activities. We reserve the right to request valid identification to verify age and deny entry to anyone unable to provide proper documentation. Gambling Risks Gambling involves risk and should be approached as a form of entertainment, not as a means of making money. There is always a possibility of losing the money you gamble. We strongly advise our patrons to gamble responsibly and within their means. Responsible Gaming Diamond Resort Casino is committed to promoting responsible gaming. We offer resources and support for those who may be experiencing problems with gambling. If you or someone you know is struggling with gambling addiction, please contact our customer support for assistance and information about available help services. Game Rules and Odds Each game in our casino has its own set of rules and odds. It is the responsibility of the player to understand these before participating. While our staff can provide basic information, we encourage players to familiarize themselves with game rules and odds independently. Liability Diamond Resort Casino shall not be held liable for any losses, damages, or injuries incurred while on our premises or as a result of participating in our gaming activities. This includes, but is not limited to, financial losses from gambling, personal injuries, or loss or damage to personal property. Right of Admission We reserve the right to refuse admission or ask any individual to leave the premises at our discretion, particularly in cases of suspected cheating, disruptive behavior, or violation of our policies. Photography and Surveillance For security purposes, our casino is under video surveillance. By entering our premises, you consent to being filmed. Personal photography or videography is strictly prohibited on the casino floor without prior written permission from management. Changes to Terms Diamond Resort Casino reserves the right to modify this disclaimer and our terms of use at any time without prior notice. It is the responsibility of our patrons to review these terms periodically. Governing Law This disclaimer and all matters relating to our casino are governed by the laws of Chennai, India. Any disputes arising from the use of our facilities shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Chennai. By entering Diamond Resort Casino or using any of our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by this disclaimer and all associated terms and conditions. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +912425633645 E-mail: diamondresort@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Diamond Resort
pages.about: About Diamond Resort - Our Story, Philosophy, and Commitment to Excellence Contact About us Casino About Diamond Resort - Our Story, Philosophy, and Commitment to Excellence Our Story Diamond Resort was born from a vision to create a haven of luxury and comfort in the heart of Chennai. Founded in 2005 by the Patel family, our hotel has grown from a small boutique establishment to a renowned destination for discerning travelers. Our journey has been one of constant evolution, always striving to exceed the expectations of our guests while maintaining the warmth of traditional Indian hospitality. Our Commitment to You At Diamond Resort, we believe that each guest is a precious gem, unique and valuable. This belief is at the core of everything we do. We understand that your stay with us is more than just a night in a hotel; it's an experience that should create lasting memories. Our dedicated team is committed to going above and beyond to ensure your comfort and satisfaction. Whether it's arranging a surprise for a special occasion, accommodating dietary requirements, or providing insider tips on exploring Chennai, we're here to make your wishes come true. Our goal is to create an environment where you feel not just welcomed, but truly at home. Our Philosophy Our philosophy is simple yet profound: "Atithi Devo Bhava" - The Guest is God. This ancient Indian principle guides our approach to hospitality. We believe in: Personalized Service: Tailoring our offerings to meet your individual needs and preferences. Continuous Improvement: Constantly upgrading our facilities and services based on guest feedback. Cultural Integration: Blending modern luxury with the rich cultural heritage of Chennai. Sustainability: Implementing eco-friendly practices to minimize our environmental impact. Your Home Away From Home Whether you're visiting Chennai for business or leisure, Diamond Resort is ready to welcome you with open arms. Our doors are always open to those seeking a blend of luxury, comfort, and authentic Indian hospitality. Don't just take our word for it - experience the Diamond difference yourself. Book your stay today and let us create a tapestry of unforgettable moments for you. Your journey to exceptional hospitality begins here. Book Your Dream Room Guest Testimonials "An oasis of tranquility in bustling Chennai. The staff went above and beyond to make our anniversary special. Truly a 5-star experience!" Sarah and John, UK "As a frequent business traveler, I've stayed in many hotels, but Diamond Resort stands out. The attention to detail and personalized service are unmatched." Rajesh Mehta, Mumbai "Our family vacation was perfect thanks to Diamond Resort. The kids loved the pool, and we parents appreciated the spa. Can't wait to return!" The Gonzalez Family, Spain "The culinary experience at Diamond Resort is out of this world. A perfect blend of local and international cuisines. A food lover's paradise!" Chef Maria Chen, Singapore Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +912425633645 E-mail: diamondresort@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Diamond Resort
pages.casino: Diamond Resort Casino - Excitement and Luxury in Chennai Contact About us Casino Diamond Resort Casino - Excitement and Luxury in Chennai Welcome to Diamond Resort Casino Step into a world of excitement and luxury at Diamond Resort Casino. Whether you're a seasoned player or new to the thrill of gaming, our casino offers an unforgettable experience. Try your luck, test your skills, and enjoy the electric atmosphere. Your winning streak starts here! About Our Casino At Diamond Resort Casino, we bring the glitz and glamour of Las Vegas to Chennai. Our state-of-the-art gaming floor features an extensive selection of classic and modern games to suit every taste. From the spin of the roulette wheel to the shuffle of cards, every moment is filled with anticipation and excitement. We pride ourselves on offering: A wide variety of slot machines and table games Regular tournaments for poker, blackjack, and more Exciting prize draws and giveaways VIP programs for our most valued players Our professional and friendly staff ensure a safe and enjoyable gaming environment for all our guests. Whether you're here for a night of fun or seeking the rush of high-stakes play, Diamond Resort Casino has something for everyone. Exclusive Casino Privileges for Hotel Guests At Diamond Resort, we believe in rewarding our valued hotel guests with extra perks to enhance their casino experience. When you book a stay with us, you'll unlock a world of exclusive casino benefits: Priority access to popular table games and slot machines Exclusive invitations to VIP tournaments and events Special discounts on food and beverages in the casino Personalized casino host service for premium room bookings Increased points earning rate in our loyalty program These special conditions are our way of saying thank you for choosing Diamond Resort as your home away from home. We're committed to making your stay and play experience truly exceptional. Book Your Room Now Popular Games Poker Paradise Test your skills and poker face in our dedicated poker room. From Texas Hold'em to Omaha, we offer a range of variants to keep the game exciting. Roulette Royale Experience the thrill of the spinning wheel. Our American and European roulette tables are always buzzing with excitement. Blackjack Bonanza Beat the dealer in this classic card game. With multiple tables and betting limits, there's a spot for every player. Slot Spectacular Try your luck on our vast array of slot machines, featuring classic reels, video slots, and progressive jackpots. Upcoming Tournaments Diamond Poker Championship Join our monthly poker tournament with a guaranteed prize pool of ₹10,00,000. Qualify through our daily satellites or buy-in directly for the main event. Blackjack Blitz Compete against other players in our high-energy blackjack tournament. Held every weekend with attractive cash prizes and resort packages up for grabs. Casino Bar: The Royal Flush After an exhilarating gaming session, unwind at our sophisticated Casino Bar, The Royal Flush. Enjoy a wide selection of premium spirits, expertly crafted cocktails, and gourmet bar snacks. Our mixologists are ready to prepare your favorite drink or surprise you with our signature creations. The Royal Flush offers a perfect blend of relaxation and excitement, with live entertainment on weekends and sports screenings. It's the ideal spot to celebrate your wins or strategize for your next game. Remember, at Diamond Resort Casino, we promote responsible gaming. Play smart, know your limits, and most importantly, have fun! pages.index: Diamond Resort Chennai - Luxury Accommodation & Exceptional Service Contact About us Casino Diamond Resort Chennai - Luxury Accommodation & Exceptional Service Welcome to Diamond Resort Where luxury meets Indian hospitality. Experience unforgettable moments in the heart of vibrant Chennai. Book your stay now and immerse yourself in comfort and elegance. Book Your Dream Room Luxurious Accommodations Exquisite Dining Experience Prime City Location Personalized Service At Diamond Resort, we are dedicated to making your stay truly exceptional. Our attentive staff works tirelessly to ensure every aspect of your visit is memorable. From the moment you arrive, we offer complimentary airport transfers, allowing you to start your journey with ease and comfort. Popular Room Types: Deluxe City View Immerse yourself in the vibrant cityscape of Chennai from our spacious Deluxe City View rooms. Featuring modern amenities and elegant decor, these rooms offer the perfect blend of comfort and style for both leisure and business travelers. Executive Suite Indulge in the ultimate luxury experience in our Executive Suites. With separate living and sleeping areas, these suites provide ample space for relaxation and work. Enjoy exclusive access to our Executive Lounge and personalized concierge services. Family Room Create lasting memories in our specially designed Family Rooms. These spacious accommodations feature comfortable bedding arrangements for parents and children, along with family-friendly amenities to ensure a delightful stay for guests of all ages. Presidential Suite Experience the pinnacle of luxury in our Presidential Suite. This opulent retreat offers breathtaking views, a private dining area, and a personal butler service. Enjoy the ultimate in privacy, comfort, and sophistication during your stay. Indulge in culinary delights at our world-class restaurant. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion, planning a wedding reception, or simply enjoying a romantic dinner, our expert chefs will create an unforgettable dining experience tailored to your preferences. Enhance your stay with our premium services designed to cater to your every need. From airport transfers to personalized concierge assistance, we go above and beyond to ensure your comfort. Book now and let us pamper you with the Diamond Resort experience. Popular Services: Airport Transfer Start and end your journey seamlessly with our complimentary airport transfer service. Our professional drivers will ensure a comfortable and timely ride between the airport and Diamond Resort, allowing you to relax from the moment you arrive in Chennai. 24/7 Concierge Our dedicated concierge team is available round-the-clock to cater to your every need. From restaurant reservations and tour bookings to personalized recommendations, we're here to ensure your stay is tailored to your preferences and expectations. Spa Treatments Rejuvenate your body and mind at our luxurious spa. Choose from a wide range of treatments, including traditional Indian therapies and international techniques, all designed to provide ultimate relaxation and wellness during your stay. City Tours Explore the rich culture and heritage of Chennai with our curated city tours. Led by knowledgeable local guides, these tours offer insights into the city's history, architecture, and vibrant local life, ensuring you make the most of your visit to this fascinating destination. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Diamond Resort | Protecting Your Personal Information Contact About us Casino Privacy Policy - Diamond Resort | Protecting Your Personal Information Privacy Policy At Diamond Resort, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your data when you visit our website, use our services, or interact with us in any way. 1. Information We Collect We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you make a reservation or use our services. We also gather non-personal information like IP addresses and browser types through cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our website. 2. How We Use Your Information We use your personal information to process reservations, provide customer service, send promotional offers (with your consent), and improve our services. Your data helps us personalize your experience and communicate important information about your stay or our services. 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your data with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website, conducting our business, or servicing you. We may also disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights, property, or safety. 4. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. 5. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also opt-out of marketing communications at any time. To exercise these rights or for any privacy-related inquiries, please contact us at diamondresort@gmail.com. 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience and provide personalized content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. 7. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. 8. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: Diamond Resort Email: diamondresort@gmail.com Last Updated: July 16, 2024 By using our website and services, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy. We appreciate your trust in us and are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +912425633645 E-mail: diamondresort@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Diamond Resort
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions | Diamond Resort Contact About us Casino Terms and Conditions | Diamond Resort Terms and Conditions Welcome to Diamond Resort. By accessing our website, making a reservation, or using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions: 1. Reservations and Cancellations 1.1. All reservations are subject to availability and confirmation by Diamond Resort. 1.2. A valid credit card is required to secure your booking. 1.3. Cancellations must be made at least 48 hours prior to the check-in date to avoid charges. 1.4. No-shows will be charged the full amount of the reservation. 2. Check-in and Check-out 2.1. Check-in time is 3:00 PM, and check-out time is 12:00 PM. 2.2. Early check-in and late check-out may be available upon request, subject to availability and additional charges. 3. Payment 3.1. All rates are in Indian Rupees and are inclusive of applicable taxes. 3.2. Additional services and amenities are charged separately. 3.3. We accept major credit cards and cash payments. 4. Casino Rules 4.1. Guests must be 21 years or older to enter the casino area. 4.2. Diamond Resort reserves the right to refuse entry or ask any person to leave the casino premises without explanation. 4.3. Photography and video recording are strictly prohibited in the casino area. 5. Liability 5.1. Diamond Resort is not responsible for any loss, theft, or damage to guests' personal belongings. 5.2. Guests are liable for any damage caused to hotel property during their stay. 6. Privacy Policy 6.1. We respect your privacy and handle all personal information in accordance with applicable data protection laws. 6.2. By providing your information, you consent to its use as outlined in our Privacy Policy. 7. Modifications to Terms 7.1. Diamond Resort reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice. 7.2. It is the responsibility of the guest to review the most current version of these terms before making a reservation. 8. Governing Law 8.1. These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. 9. Contact Information For any questions or concerns regarding these terms and conditions, please contact us at diamondresort@gmail.com. By making a reservation or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. Last updated: July 16, 2024 Disclaimer Terms conditions Privacy policy Phone: +912425633645 E-mail: diamondresort@gmail.com Contact About us Casino © 2024 Diamond Resort
